coreAtributes.name: Bimbo Collar
coreAtributes.description: This collar is like, totally cute! Itâ€™s definitely not going to cause your mind to melt away and your body to expand to an unrecognizably oversexualized caricature of your previous self teehee!

displacementText.playerSelf: You unfasten the collar's buckle and remove it from around your neck.
displacementText.playerNPC: You unfasten the collar's buckle and remove it from around [npc.name]'s neck.
displacementText.playerNPCRough: You unfasten the collar's buckle and remove it from around [npc.name]'s neck.
displacementText.NPCSelf: [npc.Name] unfastens the collar's buckle and removes it from around [npc.her] neck.
displacementText.NPCPlayer: [npc.Name] unfastens the collar's buckle and removes it from around your neck.
displacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.Name] unfastens the collar's buckle and removes it from around your neck.
displacementText.NPCOtherNPC: [npc1.Name] unfastens the collar's buckle and removes it from around [npc2.name]'s neck.
displacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [npc1.Name] unfastens the collar's buckle and removes it from around [npc2.name]'s neck.

replacementText.playerSelf: You wrap the choker around your neck and fasten the buckle.
replacementText.playerNPC: You wrap the choker around [npc.name]'s neck and fasten the buckle.
replacementText.playerNPCRough: You wrap the choker around [npc.name]'s neck and fasten the buckle.
replacementText.NPCSelf: [npc.Name] wraps the choker around [npc.her] neck and fastens the buckle.
replacementText.NPCPlayer: [npc.Name] wraps the choker around your neck and fastens the buckle.
replacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.Name] holds you still as [npc.she] roughly forces the T-shirt down over your head, before pushing your [pc.arms] through the sleeves.
replacementText.NPCOtherNPC: [npc1.name] wraps the choker around [npc2.name]'s neck and fastens the buckle.
replacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [npc1.name] wraps the choker around [npc2.name]'s neck and fastens the buckle.
